titleStmt.title: The Happy lovers pastime ... to a pleasant new tune called On the bank of a brook.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Charles Passinger, at the Seven Stars on London Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Right half of sheet contains: The Second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Seven Stars on London Bridge
